tool_description: Analyzes database schema for normalization compliance and identifies denormalization opportunities.

schema_name.description: Name of the schema to analyze for normalization

analysis_depth.description: Depth of analysis: surface, detailed, or exhaustive

error_messages: Schema not found: The specified schema_name does not exist.
Invalid analysis depth: Depth must be one of [surface, detailed, exhaustive].
Insufficient schema data: Schema must have entities with attributes for normalization analysis.
usage: Provide schema_name to analyze normalization. Optionally set analysis_depth for different levels of detail in the normalization assessment.

current_normal_form.description: Highest normal form currently achieved by the schema

normalization_recommendations.description: Recommendations for achieving higher normal forms
